description: Delete flag to indicate request to delete the reference Close Mentorship Reason passed.

Close_Mentorship_ReasonObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Close_Mentorship_ReasonObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Close_Mentorship_ReasonObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
